law.catch_line: In addition to financing the premium of a surplus lines insurance contract, a premium finance agreem...
law.text:
In addition to financing the premium of a surplus lines insurance contract, a premium finance agreement may include any:
premium receipts tax that a surplus lines broker is required to charge under § 3-324 of this article and pay to the Commissioner under § 3-325 of this article;
policy fee that a surplus lines broker is allowed to charge under § 27-216 of this article; and
inspection fee that a surplus lines broker is allowed to charge under § 27-216 of this article.
